title: how do i rise in honour level?
body:
i am honor lvl 0 after being banned for 14 days a while ago and i wont get to honor lvl 1. no its not locked and i get free rewards now. so i was just wondering how can i rise in honor lvl.
{{sticker:draven-pose}}

replies.body: Consistently good behavior, not all players will honor you but you have a better chance of earning them by just simply behaving.
thank you but i almost get 1-2 honors every game and for 1 month without getting anything so just wondering

You'll just need to keep playing games, continue to get honors, and not have toxic or unsportsmanlike behavior. Even if something you say in-game doesn't get you punished, it can still hold some weight on you honor progress.
